notes.body: Hello Kamal,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Kamal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Mamidala Vinay Kumar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We are trying to connect you at your contact number (9958378836) but the calls were left unattended from your end. Hence requesting you to kindly revert us with your convenient time or alternate number to assist you further.     As checked your sample collected on 06.12.2025  & your maximum reporting turnaround time is 58 hours, and your complete reports were updated  within this timeframe.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Reshma Kokare PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mamidala Vinay Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We are trying to connect you at your contact number (9958378836) but the calls were left unattended from your end.
Hence requesting you to kindly revert us with your convenient time or alternate number to assist you further.

As checked your sample collected on 06.12.2025  & your maximum reporting turnaround time is 58 hours, and your complete reports were updated  within this timeframe.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

notes.body: ​​​​Hello Gyaneshwar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      This email is in reference to the concern raised to order ID #656744174179352576. I will surely assist you with this.     As per the records, your order was cancelled today morning. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     I would request that you place a new order and allow us to serve you. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.  ​     If the Cash on Delivery option is available, it will appear under the payment modes in both the app and the website. Kindly try placing an order of ₹500 or above to check whether the Cash on Delivery option is available.         For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:

This email is in reference to the concern raised to order ID #656744174179352576. I will surely assist you with this.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

notes.body: Hello Fatima,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #656340890850426880-88800. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  ​   As per our record, I see LIVEASY WELLNESS CALCIUM MAGNESIUM VITAMIN D3 & ZINC - BONES & DENTAL HEALTH - BOTTLE 60 TABS was added at the time of Doctor Teleconsultation.  ​   Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.   ​  You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.  ​  Click on the link to set the refund preference:  https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.  ​   Kindly confirm whether this product was added with your consent so that we can take further action.  ​   Awaiting your response.  ​  Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Fatima,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand that you wish to raise a return request for your order #656340890850426880-88800. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.
​
As per our record, I see LIVEASY WELLNESS CALCIUM MAGNESIUM VITAMIN D3 & ZINC - BONES & DENTAL HEALTH - BOTTLE 60 TABS was added at the time of Doctor Teleconsultation.
​
Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. 
​
You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.
​
Click on the link to set the refund preference:
https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds
 
Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.
​
Kindly confirm whether this product was added with your consent so that we can take further action.
​
Awaiting your response.
​
Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Akanksha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #653057741266067456-69356, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the APTAMIL C PROTEQ INFANT FORMULA (FROM BIRTH TO 6 MONTHS) WITH SYNBIOTICS TIN 400 GM   on 11th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Akanksha,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #653057741266067456-69356, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the APTAMIL C PROTEQ INFANT FORMULA (FROM BIRTH TO 6 MONTHS) WITH SYNBIOTICS TIN 400 GM   on 11th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Jayakrishnan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656788446136008704-48397, I see the requested medicine FORACORT 6/200MCG CFC FREE BOX OF 120MD METERED DOSE INHALER was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with FORACORT 200MCG SYNCHROBREATHE WITH DOSE COUNTER BOX OF 120MD METERED DOSE INHALER to fulfil your requirements.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.     Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     The refund amount of Rs.1686.12 was initiated on 6th March 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source within 5-7 business days. Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (534203983850).     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888. helpdesk_ticket.description:
अपने निर्माता को चुनने के 5 कारण:
1) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
2) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
3) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
4) आपके निर्माता की स्थिरता और विश्वासनीयता
5) उत्पाद की कीमत

इसके अलावा अन्य बिंदु भी हो सकते हैं, जैसे स्थान, धर्म, निर्माता के पास
पैकिंग की उपलब्धता, निर्माता के साथ व्यवहार और संबंध, स्टाफ और मालिक का
व्यवहार, लेकिन किसी भी मार्केटर के लिए एक सबसे महत्वपूर्ण प्राथमिकता
गुणवत्ता होती है और आपका निर्माता स्थिर और विश्वसनीय होना चाहिए और अनुभवी
खिलाड़ी होना चाहिए ताकि आपको निर्माता के पास नियमित दौरे या कार्य के लिए
लगातार कॉल करने की आवश्यकता न पड़े। निर्माण एक सुचारू प्रक्रिया होनी चाहिए
और इसमें समय लगता है।

यही हमारा दृष्टिकोण है और यही हम मांग रहे हैं:
1) हम 20 साल पुराने कंपनी हैं
2) हम आपको सर्वोच्च गुणवत्ता की गारंटी देते हैं
3) हम आपको गारंटी देते हैं कि आपकी हर पैसा हमारे साथ सुरक्षित है
4) हम समयबद्ध प्रेषण प्रदान करते हैं
5) दिल्ली के पास, रुड़की में बेहतरीन स्थान, पूरे भारत से अच्छी तरह जुड़ा हुआ
6) WHO GMP, GLP और GMP प्रमाणित कंपनी
7) बड़ी संख्या में अनुमोदन। जैसे कि आप अब जानते हैं नए अनुमोदन कठिन हैं। अब
वे बीई क्लास 2 और क्लास 4 को मंजूरी नहीं दे रहे हैं।
8) change पार्ट्स में बड़ी संख्या और विविधता के बदलाव।
9) उत्तराखंड में एक ही बैनर के तहत सबसे बड़ी विविधता, आधुनिक दवाइयाँ,
न्यूट्रास्यूटिकल्स, खाद्य उत्पाद, हर्बल उत्पाद, एफरवेसेंट टैबलेट्स और
गमीज़, प्रोटीन पाउडर, कॉस्मेटिक्स, औषधीय साबुन, औषधीय टूथपेस्ट, रंगीन
कॉस्मेटिक्स और परफ्यूम आदि।
10) हम एक स्थिर, वित्तीय रूप से स्वतंत्र और बढ़ती हुई कंपनी हैं। एक ही
क्षेत्र में तीन कंपनियां आपकी सच्चाई और 100% परीक्षण तथा गुणवत्ता सुनिश्चित
करने के लिए हैं, आज हमारे किसी भी विक्रेता से पूछें। आज हम आपको यह जानकारी
देते हैं कि हमारे पास कार्डियोलॉजी उत्पादों की बहुत विस्तृत रेंज है।

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
अपने निर्माता को चुनने के 5 कारण:
1) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
2) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
3) उत्पाद की गुणवत्ता
4) आपके निर्माता की स्थिरता और विश्वासनीयता
5) उत्पाद की कीमत

इसके अलावा अन्य बिंदु भी हो सकते हैं, जैसे स्थान, धर्म, निर्माता के पास पैकिंग की उपलब्धता, निर्माता के साथ व्यवहार और संबंध, स्टाफ और मालिक का व्यवहार, लेकिन किसी भी मार्केटर के लिए एक सबसे महत्वपूर्ण प्राथमिकता गुणवत्ता होती है और आपका निर्माता स्थिर और विश्वसनीय होना चाहिए और अनुभवी खिलाड़ी होना चाहिए ताकि आपको निर्माता के पास नियमित दौरे या कार्य के लिए लगातार कॉल करने की आवश्यकता न पड़े। निर्माण एक सुचारू प्रक्रिया होनी चाहिए और इसमें समय लगता है।

यही हमारा दृष्टिकोण है और यही हम मांग रहे हैं:
1) हम 20 साल पुराने कंपनी हैं
2) हम आपको सर्वोच्च गुणवत्ता की गारंटी देते हैं
3) हम आपको गारंटी देते हैं कि आपकी हर पैसा हमारे साथ सुरक्षित है
4) हम समयबद्ध प्रेषण प्रदान करते हैं
5) दिल्ली के पास, रुड़की में बेहतरीन स्थान, पूरे भारत से अच्छी तरह जुड़ा हुआ
6) WHO GMP, GLP और GMP प्रमाणित कंपनी
7) बड़ी संख्या में अनुमोदन। जैसे कि आप अब जानते हैं नए अनुमोदन कठिन हैं। अब वे बीई क्लास 2 और क्लास 4 को मंजूरी नहीं दे रहे हैं।
8) change पार्ट्स में बड़ी संख्या और विविधता के बदलाव।
9) उत्तराखंड में एक ही बैनर के तहत सबसे बड़ी विविधता, आधुनिक दवाइयाँ, न्यूट्रास्यूटिकल्स, खाद्य उत्पाद, हर्बल उत्पाद, एफरवेसेंट टैबलेट्स और गमीज़, प्रोटीन पाउडर, कॉस्मेटिक्स, औषधीय साबुन, औषधीय टूथपेस्ट, रंगीन कॉस्मेटिक्स और परफ्यूम आदि।
10) हम एक स्थिर, वित्तीय रूप से स्वतंत्र और बढ़ती हुई कंपनी हैं। एक ही क्षेत्र में तीन कंपनियां आपकी सच्चाई और 100% परीक्षण तथा गुणवत्ता सुनिश्चित करने के लिए हैं, आज हमारे किसी भी विक्रेता से पूछें। आज हम आपको यह जानकारी देते हैं कि हमारे पास कार्डियोलॉजी उत्पादों की बहुत विस्तृत रेंज है।

notes.body: Hi Team,     After reviewing the call, we found that the consultation was made early in the morning after our operational hours started at 7:30 AM. The customer was upset about why the consultation call was arranged. During the call, the doctor asked for the patient’s details regarding the ordered medicines. The customer mentioned that the prescription had already been uploaded and questioned the need for a consultation call.  Upon checking the details, we found that the call was arranged for NEXPRO RD 40MG (Strip of 10 Capsules) and PAN 40MG (Strip of 15 Tablets). Although a prescription was uploaded, one of the medicines was not mentioned in it, which is why the consultation call was required.  We also verified the call, and there was no misbehavior from the doctor during the consultation.

notes.body: The customer raised the concern that I placed an order for the Morf solution in October and opened the parcel in December. The 3-minute timer is not sent with the parcel. While the instructions say that every pack container also states that, while all the previous solutions I ordered were yellow in colour and had a strong odour, this new one is white in colour and odourless less almost like water. I have concerns regarding that. Please clarify if the solution is safe to use or if something is wrong with the order. The medicine is set to expire in April 2027.     Kindly check and do the needful.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the highly unprofessional
and unethical behavior I experienced during my recent sample collection
appointment booked through PharmEasy.

I had booked a slot for 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM. However, even before the
scheduled time, I received multiple calls:

A call from customer care at 6:50 AM

A call from the lab technician at 6:53 AM, made from his personal mobile
number, asking for the OTP even though he had not reached my location


At around 7:25 AM, the technician arrived but entered my house without
ringing the doorbell or seeking permission. Once inside, he began insisting
that I reschedule or cancel my order. His tone was extremely rude and
disrespectful. This is completely unacceptable.

Additionally, another person whose identity I do not know also called me
and asked me to reschedule. Both individuals were demanding the same thing,
which raises serious questions about the professionalism and safety
protocols followed by your team.

This is not the first time I am facing such issues with your service. A
similar situation occurred earlier as well, but this time the technician’s
behavior was unethical, intrusive, and concerning.

I request PharmEasy to:

1. Provide a detailed explanation of this behavior.


2. Clarify whether this conduct is in line with your official policies.


3. Take appropriate action against the individuals involved.


4. Ensure such incidents do not occur with any customer in the future.

Note: Till now sample collection was not completed its very disappointing
the trust even it's paid.



I expect a prompt and satisfactory response, as this incident caused
significant stress and raises questions about safety, professionalism, and
service quality.

Thank you,
Raja shekar Buska.

--

Description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the highly unprofessional and unethical behavior I experienced during my recent sample collection appointment booked through PharmEasy.

I had booked a slot for 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM. However, even before the scheduled time, I received multiple calls:

A call from customer care at 6:50 AM

A call from the lab technician at 6:53 AM, made from his personal mobile number, asking for the OTP even though he had not reached my location


At around 7:25 AM, the technician arrived but entered my house without ringing the doorbell or seeking permission. Once inside, he began insisting that I reschedule or cancel my order. His tone was extremely rude and disrespectful. This is completely unacceptable.

Additionally, another person whose identity I do not know also called me and asked me to reschedule. Both individuals were demanding the same thing, which raises serious questions about the professionalism and safety protocols followed by your team.

This is not the first time I am facing such issues with your service. A similar situation occurred earlier as well, but this time the technician’s behavior was unethical, intrusive, and concerning.

I request PharmEasy to:

1. Provide a detailed explanation of this behavior.


2. Clarify whether this conduct is in line with your official policies.


3. Take appropriate action against the individuals involved.


4. Ensure such incidents do not occur with any customer in the future.

Note: Till now sample collection was not completed its very disappointing the trust even it's paid. 



I expect a prompt and satisfactory response, as this incident caused significant stress and raises questions about safety, professionalism, and service quality.

Thank you,
Raja shekar Buska.

Additionally, another person whose identity I do not know also called me and asked me to reschedule. Both individuals were demanding the same thing, which raises serious questions about the professionalism and safety protocols followed by your team.

This is not the first time I am facing such issues with your service. A similar situation occurred earlier as well, but this time the technician’s behavior was unethical, intrusive, and concerning.

notes.body: Hello Mr. Raja Shekar Buska,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   With reference to below mail & Order ID  : 6242208. Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, We hope to have addressed your concerns.  Further we would like to inform you that as per OTOF policy we will credit cashback of Rs. 819/-  in your PharmEasy wallet with 60 days validity within 48-72 hrs Below are the usage criteria for your reference  You can pay 5% of your medicine order value with PharmEasy Credits. You can pay 50% of your Lab Test Booking value with PharmEasy Credits.  We sincerely regret the inconvenience experienced by you and shall be happy to provide you with a hassle free service in future. For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Reshma Kokare PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mr. Raja Shekar Buska,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With reference to below mail & Order ID  : 6242208.
Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, We hope to have addressed your concerns.

Further we would like to inform you that as per OTOF policy we will credit cashback of Rs. 819/-  in your PharmEasy wallet with 60 days validity within 48-72 hrs
Below are the usage criteria for your reference

You can pay 5% of your medicine order value with PharmEasy Credits.
You can pay 50% of your Lab Test Booking value with PharmEasy Credits.

We sincerely regret the inconvenience experienced by you and shall be happy to provide you with a hassle free service in future.
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Deepak,     Greetings from PharmEasy!       I understand your query is related to placing a medicine order.      To place an order, you may visit the PharmEasy app or website. Alternatively, you may call us on 9992999929 and press option number "1" to place an order on call.     You can place your order through the PharmEasy App by following the steps below:     - Download and open the PharmEasy App  - Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name, and add it to the cart.  - Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.  - Apply any coupon (If applicable).  - Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  

I understand your query is related to placing a medicine order. 

To place an order, you may visit the PharmEasy app or website. Alternatively, you may call us on 9992999929 and press option number "1" to place an order on call.

You can place your order through the PharmEasy App by following the steps below:

- Download and open the PharmEasy App
- Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name, and add it to the cart.
- Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.
- Apply any coupon (If applicable).
- Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"

I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

You can place your order through PharmEasy App by following the below steps:  - Download and open the PharmEasy App  - Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name and add it to the cart.  - Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.  - Apply any coupon (If applicable).  - Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team for order placement. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Subhash,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your query is related to placing a medicine order. 

To place an order, you may visit the PharmEasy app or website. Alternatively, you may call us on 9992999929 and press option number "1" to place an order on call.

You can place your order through PharmEasy App by following the below steps:
- Download and open the PharmEasy App
- Click on "Order Medicines" and search for the medicine/product name and add it to the cart.
- Select the medicine/product quantity and click on "Continue" and Add/Change delivery address.
- Apply any coupon (If applicable).
- Select the available payment mode and click on "Place Order"

I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team for order placement. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: RAJA SHEKAR <rajashekar.24b@gmail.com>
Date: Mon, Dec 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM
Subject: Formal Complaint Regarding Unprofessional Behavior by Lab Technician and Service Issues
To: <care@pharmeasy.in>, <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>


Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the highly unprofessional and unethical behavior I experienced during my recent sample collection appointment booked through PharmEasy.

I had booked a slot for 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM. However, even before the scheduled time, I received multiple calls:

A call from customer care at 6:50 AM

A call from the lab technician at 6:53 AM, made from his personal mobile number, asking for the OTP even though he had not reached my location


At around 7:25 AM, the technician arrived but entered my house without ringing the doorbell or seeking permission. Once inside, he began insisting that I reschedule or cancel my order. His tone was extremely rude and disrespectful. This is completely unacceptable.

Additionally, another person whose identity I do not know also called me and asked me to reschedule. Both individuals were demanding the same thing, which raises serious questions about the professionalism and safety protocols followed by your team.

This is not the first time I am facing such issues with your service. A similar situation occurred earlier as well, but this time the technician’s behavior was unethical, intrusive, and concerning.

I request PharmEasy to:

1. Provide a detailed explanation of this behavior.


2. Clarify whether this conduct is in line with your official policies.


3. Take appropriate action against the individuals involved.


4. Ensure such incidents do not occur with any customer in the future.

Note: Till now sample collection was not completed its very disappointing the trust even it's paid. 



I expect a prompt and satisfactory response, as this incident caused significant stress and raises questions about safety, professionalism, and service quality.

Thank you,
Raja shekar Buska.

notes.body:
Hi Sir,

Please find the updated details for the below case:

*Issue*: Phlebo requested OTP before arrival and forced the customer to
reschedule the order post arrival.

*Order Details*:
Order ID: 6242208 / VL2DAFE2
Source of Booking: Android
Booked for: Maria Angelica Trabezonda, 29Y/F
Booked Test: Hemoglobin Variant Analysis - HPLC
Requested Slot: 08-12-2025, 07:00 AM – 08:00 AM
Assigned Phlebo: Kaki Ashok
Sample Collected By: Nyala Raju
City: Warangal, Telangana 506003 (ROI)
Order Value: Rs. 819

*Case Details*:
07-12-2025 11:58 PM: Order placed by the customer for the 07:00–08:00 AM
slot.
08-12-2025 06:48 AM: Phlebo initiated a tri-party call as the customer’s
number was switched off. Agent connected with the customer and established
a conference call between phlebo and customer. Phlebo obtained an alternate
contact number from the customer.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: RAJA SHEKAR <rajashekar.24b@gmail.com>
Date: Mon, Dec 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM
Subject: Formal Complaint Regarding Unprofessional Behavior by Lab Technician and Service Issues
To: <care@pharmeasy.in>, <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>


Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the highly unprofessional and unethical behavior I experienced during my recent sample collection appointment booked through PharmEasy.

I had booked a slot for 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM. However, even before the scheduled time, I received multiple calls:

A call from customer care at 6:50 AM

A call from the lab technician at 6:53 AM, made from his personal mobile number, asking for the OTP even though he had not reached my location


At around 7:25 AM, the technician arrived but entered my house without ringing the doorbell or seeking permission. Once inside, he began insisting that I reschedule or cancel my order. His tone was extremely rude and disrespectful. This is completely unacceptable.

Additionally, another person whose identity I do not know also called me and asked me to reschedule. Both individuals were demanding the same thing, which raises serious questions about the professionalism and safety protocols followed by your team.

This is not the first time I am facing such issues with your service. A similar situation occurred earlier as well, but this time the technician’s behavior was unethical, intrusive, and concerning.

I request PharmEasy to:

1. Provide a detailed explanation of this behavior.


2. Clarify whether this conduct is in line with your official policies.


3. Take appropriate action against the individuals involved.


4. Ensure such incidents do not occur with any customer in the future.

Note: Till now sample collection was not completed its very disappointing the trust even it's paid. 



I expect a prompt and satisfactory response, as this incident caused significant stress and raises questions about safety, professionalism, and service quality.

Thank you,
Raja shekar Buska.
